author: github-actions[bot]
body:
This is a new minor release of scancode.io with:
- updated scancode-toolkit
- performance and quality improvements in package, license, copyright detection
- support for python3.14

## What's Changed
* Handled the logger generated class in D2D  by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/1996
* Upgrade scancode-toolkit to latest v32.4.1 release by @tdruez @AyanSinhaMahapatra  in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/1984
* fix: exclude certain file patterns from map_deploy_to_develop (Java) by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/1995
* Regen test fixtures and fix tests after scancode-toolkit upgrade by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/1997
* fix: Sanitize ORT package IDs to handle colons in versions by @FabianRolfMatthiasNoll in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2005
* Perform basic mapping before normalizing mapping by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/1999
* Update minecode pipelines with stable release v0.1.1 by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2013
* Fix typos in docstrings for pathmap.py by @pranavkeerti66-hue in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/1985
* Store the whole vulnerability data from cdx to local models by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2007
* Add project vulnerability list view by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2018
* Improve class file mapping by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2021
* Restructure documentation index by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2028
* Update README.rst to improve structure by @DennisClark @AyanSinhaMahapatra  in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2032
* Update scancode-toolkit with faster package scan by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2000

## New Contributors
* @pranavkeerti66-hue made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/1985
* @DennisClark made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/pull/2032

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode.io/compare/v36.0.1...v36.1.0

author: github-actions[bot]
body:
This is a minor scancode release with:

- license, package detection performance improvements
- better copyright, license and package detection
- python3.14 support, and removed python3.9 wheels

- Improve package scan performance by:

  - Skipping binary package detection steps by default,
    and introducing a new CLI option ``--package-in-compiled``
    to detect packages in compiled binaries like rust/go binaries
    Note: previously these were detected in ``--package`` CLI
    option directly but this is no longer the case, you've to
    use the new ``--package-in-compiled`` to detect packages
    from go/rust and other binaries

  - Creating cached regex patterns and multiregex pre-matchers,
    for a fast package path detection filtering step

  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4606

- Add gibberish detection to copyright scanning. This is done using a
  2-character Markov chain. A new CLI command,
  ``scancode-train-gibberish-model``, has been added to regenerate the model
  used by the detector.
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4610
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/issues/2402

- Use a cython implementation of sequence matcher to improve
  license detection performance
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4500

- Add python3.14 support in scancode
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4595
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/issues/4541

- Always print license references table in html output
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4474

- Enable License References table for HTML Output without requiring
  `--license-references` by implementing a fallback license reference
  collection based on the behavior of v32.0.0.
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4474
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/issues/4101

- Replace unmaintained ``toml`` library with ``tomllib`` / ``tomli``.
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/issues/4532

- Pin fingerprints and normality to avoid pyicu
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/issues/4493

- Fix click compatibility issues and failures
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/issues/4572

- Remove deprecated ast module attributes
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4539

- Fix cargo scanning failures
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/issues/4581

- Reorg and improve docs user experience
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4629

- Handle is_private strings in npm properly
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4635

- Restructure README docs
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4667

- Add new licenses, license rules and misc license detection
  improvements
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4562
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4674
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4666
  https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4622

## What's Changed

* feat(OutputHTML): Always print license references table by @pepper-jk in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4474
* Cython seq by @JonoYang in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4500
* Update cyseq to v0.0.2 by @JonoYang in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4512
* Add new licenses to LicenseDB by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4517
* Pin fingerprints and normality by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4531
* Fix click compatibility issues by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4591
* packagedcode: replace unmaintained toml with tomllib/tomli by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4594
* packagedcode: replace unmaintained toml with tomllib/tomli by @gotmax23 in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4532
* packagedcode: don't use removed ast module attributes by @gotmax23 in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4539
* Add new licenses from dejacode by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4562
* Fixes #4581: Failure to scan cargo  by @omsuneri in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4582
* Add tag to ruby license rule by @pombredanne in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4622
* docs: Reorg and improve user experience by @tsteenbe in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4629
* Handle string is private by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4635
* Restructure the README by @DennisClark in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4667
* Detect plantuml license by @uttam282005 in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4666
* Improve package scan performance by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4606
* Detect gibberish copyright #2402 by @JonoYang in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4610
* Make CC-BY-NC-3 rule more specific by @alexzurbonsen in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4674
* Add python3.14 to test support by @AyanSinhaMahapatra in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4595

## New Contributors
* @pepper-jk made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4474
* @omsuneri made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4582
* @uttam282005 made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/pull/4666

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aboutcode-org/scancode-toolkit/compare/v32.4.1...v32.5.0

author: github-actions[bot]
body:
## What's Changed
* Upgrade pip, django-altcha, bleach, and charset_normalizer by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/398
* Refactor LDAP test to remove dependency on mockldap by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/419
* Update ProductPackage license unknown during Scan all Packages by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/420
* Allow "Scan all packages" availability to "change_product" users by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/421
* Refine UI and consistency around Scan actions by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/425
* Move the user id from project name to a label #387 by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/426
* Upgrade Django to latest security release v5.2.8 by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/427
* Add Dataspace FK validation on Dataspace and DejacodeUser models by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/431
* Packaging for Debian by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/424
* Packaging for Fedora by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/422
* Fix a bug with the scan_status_fields on empty runs by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/433
* Prioritize hashes and download URL for PurlDB mapping by @rogu-beta in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/430
* Update weighted_risk_score on updating the relationship by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/436
* Packaging for Nix by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/391
* Upgrade django-grappelli to latest version by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/437
* Migrate from rq-scheduler to new built-in CronScheduler by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/435
* Export OpenVEX VEX document by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/442
* feat: add support for PyPI purls in purl resolution by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/443
* feat: add option to infer_download_urls on product importers by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/444
* fix: update "add_to" javascript selector by @tdruez in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/445

## New Contributors
* @chinyeungli made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/424
* @rogu-beta made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/pull/430

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aboutcode-org/dejacode/compare/v5.4.1...v5.5.0

author: github-actions[bot]
body:
This is a major new release with all core code fragment and AI-generated code search features now available, including index-time matching.

- We also have improved support for on demand data collection for more ecosystems.
- The purldb-toolkit has moved to its own repo at https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb-toolkit 
- The matchcode-toolkit has moved to its own repo at https://github.com/aboutcode-org/matchcode-toolkit

## What's Changed
* Use JsonResponse #585 by @JonoYang in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/586
* Index time matching by @JonoYang in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/591
* Fixes Issue #587 by @MohannadAK in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/593
* Collect pypi PURL ondemand #468 by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/592
* Add PyPI to supported_ecosystems #599 by @JonoYang in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/600
* Collect Cargo PURL ondemand #594 by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/598
* Output verbose test failure #589 by @pombredanne in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/590
* Collect Rubygems PURL ondemand #595 by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/603
* Update skeleton by @JonoYang in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/604
* add on demand package data collection for nuget #597  by @chinyeungli in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/606
* Remove purldb-toolkit by @JonoYang in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/610

## New Contributors
* @MohannadAK made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/593
* @chinyeungli made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/pull/592

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aboutcode-org/purldb/compare/v6.0.0...v7.0.0

author: github-actions[bot]
body:
## What's Changed
* Add initial support for vulnerablecode by @ziadhany in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/2
* Add missing permissions check on some activities like Update, Delete. by @ziadhany in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/8
* Add JSON schema for Package and Vulnerability metadata by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/11
* Improve format, doc and configuration by @pombredanne in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/18
* Fix Failing Read the Docs Build by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/21
* Add Django app directory to sys.path for autodoc by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/22
* Fix docker-compose and dockerfile config by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/30
* Add docs for how to run the app by @ziadhany in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/38
* Add FederatedCode client to fetch package scan by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/45
* Add pipeline to advertise scancode.io scans  by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/44
* Add federatedcode CLI by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/46
* Add endpoint to subscribe to package activity by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/49
* Add support for subscribing to package updates over AP from PurlDB or VulnerableCode by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/50
* Add utility and cli to discover PURL on AP server by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/52
* Remove unused direct dependencies  by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/53
* Prepare `aboutcode.federatedcode` v0.1.0 release by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/54
* Add documentation for getting started and remote subscription by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/59
* Fix Read the Docs doc build by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/60
* Add `fedcode` command line entrypoint by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/61
* Use id and repo in Vulnerability unique_together by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/63
* UI/UX Improvements for Deployment by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/66
* UI/UX Improvements for Deployment - 2 by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/70
* Prepare v0.1.0 release by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/71
* Bump federatedcode to v0.1.0 by @keshav-space in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/72

## New Contributors
* @ziadhany made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/2
* @keshav-space made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/11
* @pombredanne made their first contribution in https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/pull/18

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aboutcode-org/federatedcode/commits/v0.1.0

author: chinyeungli
body:
## What's Changed
* Update link references of ownership from nexB to aboutcode-org
